text: phir jab tum apanee haj sambandhee reetiyon ko poora kar chuko to allaah ko yaad karo jaise apane baap-daada ko yaad karate rahe ho, balki usase bhee badhakar yaad karo. phir logon sen koee to aisa hai jo kahata hai, "hamaare rab! hamen duniya mein de do." aisee haalat mein aakhirat mein usaka koee hissa nahin
